name: Flower Shower
description:
This is my first game jam game! I kept the scope small and had a lot of fun making it. I had a math test this week too, so I'm glad I could make the time to complete it :') 

I also realize that it is a bit too easy, so I plan on making it harder by shifting the variables around a little bit.

Hope you guys enjoy it!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

~~ 🌹CONTROLS🌷 ~~

Move - A,D or Left,Right Arrows

Jump - Space Bar

Open Options Menu - Q

Shake - K

~~ 🌼INSTRUCTIONS🌺 ~~

Collect flowers, Avoid falling branches (they hurt!), and Shake Off (rapidly press K) caterpillars and beetles (they eat your flowers!)

Comment your high scores! :D

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Submitted to the Great Spring Game Jam: 2021.
